definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (appar. pointed to mean good-for-nothing ([[אַל]] as neg.) v. De Di Du Sta:Gesch i. 590, orig. [[טָֽבְאֵל]]; Ol:§ 91 d Kö:ii, 537 al. think [[אַָל]]- simply pausal form)—Aramean, whose son Peḳaḫ and Reṣin proposed to make king of Jerus. in place of Ahaz; only [[בֶּן־טָֽבְאַָל]] Is 7:6 (Wkl:Alttest. Untersuch. 1892. 74 identif. with Reṣin, comparing [[טַבְרִמּׂן]] father of Benhadad).
